name: Davos
short_description: Lightweight download manager for managing files with web interface.
description: Lightweight download manager for managing files with web interface. Davos is a self-hosted application focused on download, file-management, media, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Davos on your home server to lightweight download manager for managing files with web interface without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Davos to manage your download workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
